bug.author: daquexian
bug.summary: Linking error on some platforms and non-release mode
bug.description:
Ubuntu 18.04 上用 Release/ReleaseWithDebInfo 以外的模式编译 oneflow 会报错，在 manylinux2014 容器里编译也观察到同样的现象。已知是 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Oneflow-Inc/oneflow/pull/3702>#3702</denchmark-link> 合并后出现的（提示：在合并 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Oneflow-Inc/oneflow/pull/3708>#3708</denchmark-link> 之后才可以编译否则会出现另一个错误信息），但不清楚具体原因。 报错信息是：
[100%] Linking CXX shared module python_scripts/oneflow/_oneflow_internal.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so /usr/bin/ld: /tmp/ccrOf02c.ltrans1.ltrans.o: relocation R_X86_64_PC32 against symbol `_ZNSt12__shared_ptrIN7oneflow11OpAttributeELN9__gnu_cxx12_Lock_policyE2EEC1Ev' can not be used when making a shared object; recompile with -fPIC /usr/bin/ld: final link failed: Bad value collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status CMakeFiles/oneflow_internal.dir/build.make:1655: recipe for target 'python_scripts/oneflow/_oneflow_internal.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so' failed make[2]: *** [python_scripts/oneflow/_oneflow_internal.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so] Error 1 CMakeFiles/Makefile2:1885: recipe for target 'CMakeFiles/oneflow_internal.dir/all' failed make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/oneflow_internal.dir/all] Error 2 Makefile:94: recipe for target 'all' failed make: *** [all] Error 2
